restaurants.name: Curry World
restaurants.info: Using the freshest ingredients, Curry World offers flavorful curries from Thailand, India, Japan, and other countries. Pick a hearty deep red Mussaman curry from northern Thailand.  Or, how about a creamy and rich Tikka Masala?  A smooth traditional Japanese brown curry?  No matter what flavor your customers desire, Curry World has the right variety to satisfy your curry cravings.

restaurants.name: Grand Pacific
restaurants.info: Our restaurant is relaxing and friendly, with large floor to ceiling windows to take in the stunning views.

restaurants.name: Chinese Noodles
restaurants.info: We are specialised in the art of noodle making. With over 30 years of experiece, Chinese Noodles is bound to satisfy your needs of various noodle varieties.

restaurants.name: Heart Cafe
restaurants.info: Heart Cafe is now nourishing both the body and the soul with organic, gluten free and vegan options in a warm, connecting space where friends and neighbors come together.

restaurants.name: Chocolatier
restaurants.info: Chocolatier places you in a world of pleasure, fulfilling your chocolate desires.

restaurants.name: Eleven Bridge
restaurants.info: Our goal is to provide excellent food and outstanding customer to service to all our guests.

restaurants.name: Mario's Pizzeria & Restaurant
restaurants.info: Mario's welcomes you to a delightful and intriguing restaurant to satisfy your Italian taste buds.

restaurants.name: Willy Wonka's Chocolate Factory
restaurants.info: The OG outlet for all the chocolate a customer could want.

restaurants.name: Alvin's Seafood Palace
restaurants.info: If it isn't delicious, scrumptious seafood, it isn't Alvin's. A remarkable establishment providing seafood of a wide variety.

restaurants.name: McDonald's Liverpool
restaurants.info: With more than one million of you coming through our restaurants every day, it’s our priority to maintain your trust and integrity. To do this we make sure our customers and employees receive the respect they deserve.

restaurants.name: McDonald's Burwood
restaurants.info: With more than one million of you coming through our restaurants every day, it’s our priority to maintain your trust and integrity. To do this we make sure our customers and employees receive the respect they deserve.

restaurants.name: Sushi Train
restaurants.info: Ever wanted a sushi restaurant with an interesting twist? Well Sushi Train is the place for you, presenting their sushi dishes on a mobile conveyor belt for any customer to take.

restaurants.name: Luigi's Italian House
restaurants.info: Luigi's welcomes you to a delightful and intriguing restaurant to satisfy your Italian taste buds.

restaurants.name: Dex's Diner
restaurants.info: Our popular restaurant has just moved from Coruscant to a brand new location for Earth's inhabitants to enjoy, allowing humans to experience a new type of food.

restaurants.name: Joe's Hutt
restaurants.info: Joe's hutt lets customers enjoy nice outback style foods in an outdoors setting.

restaurants.name: Smokey's Kebabs
restaurants.address: 109 George's River Road, Croydon Park, NSW
restaurants.info: Smokey's newly opened Kebab shop provides customers with the Turkish cuisine favourites such as kebabs and pide.

restaurants.name: Paul's Pot Pies
restaurants.info: Paul's Pies are not for the faint of heart, our restaurant creates innovative pies to widen the palette of our customers.

restaurants.name: Wrap King
restaurants.info: Wrap King, as the name suggests, are the kings of wrap making, giving customers a large variety of ingredients to choose from when ordering.

restaurants.name: KFC Burwood
restaurants.info: Built from the work of Colonel Sanders, our KFC chicken is the best that the world has to offer.

restaurants.name: Turkish Paradise
restaurants.info: Our restaurant places customers in a Turkish setting of belly dancers, friendly service, and envelops their tastebuds with the tastes of traditional Turkish cuisine.

restaurants.name: Lebanese House
restaurants.info: As the name entitles, our restaurant, once a standard house, is packed with the essence of lebanese style eating.

restaurants.name: Red Rooster Croydon
restaurants.info: For fast, delicious food, Red Rooster is the place to be.

restaurants.name: Hungry Jacks Croydon
restaurants.info: For fast, delicious food, Hungry Jacks is the place to be.

restaurants.name: Subway Croydon Park
restaurants.address: 33 Georges River Road, Croydon Park, NSW
restaurants.info: In our restaurant, customers may choose from a large selection of ingredients to create their own healthy, subway-style, sandwich.

restaurants.name: Stan's Fish and Chips
restaurants.info: Stan's fish and chips is a classic fast-food restaurant for oceanic based eating.

restaurants.name: Bob's Burgers
restaurants.info: We at Bob's Burgers aim to not only sell amazing burgers to our customers but also to get people to re-think what a burger truly is.

restaurants.name: Pasta Palace
restaurants.info: Pasta Palace places its customers in a luxurious setting, giving them the sense of being royalty.

restaurants.name: Outback Steakhouse
restaurants.info: For amazing and delicious ribs, burgers, and steaks, come to Outback Steakhouse. A long-time favourite for all meat lovers.

restaurants.name: Oporto Strathfield
restaurants.info: With our restaurant located world-wide, we here at Oporto aim to provide customers with the best fast-food possible.

restaurants.name: Oporto Lakemba
restaurants.info: With our restaurant located world-wide, we here at Oporto aim to provide customers with the best fast-food possible.

restaurants.name: Sherman's Seafood
restaurants.info: Sherman's seafood, located underwater, provides customers with not only excellent seafoood but a magnificent view of the ocean.

restaurants.name: Korean BBQ
restaurants.info: We aim to provide a stunning Korean BBQ experience to all our customers.

restaurants.name: Shree Sweets
restaurants.info: Shree, the owner of Shree Sweets, claims 'Shree Sweets will become the ultimate restaurant for desserts'.

restaurants.name: Heaven's Sweet Tooth
restaurants.info: Heaven's Sweet Tooth will satisfy every sweet toothed customer who enters this restaurant with exquisite desserts like cakes, and macarons.

restaurants.name: Subway Richmond
restaurants.info: In our restaurant, customers may choose from a large selection of ingredients to create their own healthy, subway-style, sandwich.

restaurants.name: Chocolates Del Mondo
restaurants.info: Chocolates Del Mondo is a chocolate lovers paradise filled with a large variety of chocolate goods.

restaurants.name: George's Cafe
restaurants.info: Our restaurant gives customers value for their money, providing large portion sizes for a wide variety of meals.

restaurants.name: Harry's Cafe De Wheels
restaurants.info: Harry's Cafe De Wheels presents interesting, out of the ordinary pies for our customers, changing their perspective on the glory of pies.

restaurants.name: Patrick's Pizzeria
restaurants.info: A classic Italian pizzeria, Patrick's is an excellent quality restaurant that shows its customers the true essence of Italian style cooking.

restaurants.name: Destiny's Platoon
restaurants.info: A restaurant located on water, Destiny's Platoon serves classic seafood dishes to its customers in a unique, and beautiful setting.
